As an AI language model, I do not have personal experience with social media platforms nor do I have personal opinions. However, here are some tips on how to use Tumblr to promote your artwork and connect with fellow artists:

1. Create a Tumblr account and start sharing your artwork on your blog. Make sure to tag your posts with relevant keywords such as #art, #illustration, or #painting, so that other users can find your work easily.

2. Follow other artists and reblog their posts to show your support. You can also leave comments on their work to start a conversation.

3. Participate in Tumblr's artist community by joining groups or participating in tags, such as #artists on tumblr or #my art, which will help you connect with other artists who share similar interests.

4. Share behind-the-scenes photos or videos of your art process to give your audience a glimpse into your creative process.

5. Use Tumblr's messaging feature to reach out to other artists and collaborate on projects or just chat about art in general.

6. You can also consider using Tumblr Ads to promote your artwork to a wider audience. Reach out to your followers for a better understanding of their preferences, usage, and sentiment of your work.

Remember to use Tumblr primarily as a place where you can share your passion and love for art. Authenticity is the key to success on social media.
